name: denitrification

the action of denitrifying: biological/bacterial denitrification There will be a denitrification unit to remove nitrogen dioxide from the tunnel. See
denitrify
More examplesFewer examplesDenitrification of leached nitrate accounted for 26-35% of nitrous oxide emissions.Subtropical and tropical landscapes tend to be poor in nitrogen because of high rates of denitrification.The removal of bioavailable nitrogen via denitrification may be increased by this method.
